hero.description: Get instant mobile data in 200+ countries. No physical SIM needed. Activate anywhere, anytime with our reliable global eSIM network.

deviceCompatibility.description: Works with all modern smartphones and tablets that support eSIM technology.

plans.subtitle: Choose Your Perfect eSIM Plan
plans.description: Select from our wide range of data plans designed for every type of traveler. From short trips to extended stays, we have you covered.

activation.appAvailable: Our App Available for both iOS and Android devices.
activation.appDescription: Get the most out of your eSIM with our mobile app. Manage your plans, track usage, and get instant support.
activation.appLinksSoon: App store links will be available soon.
activation.followSteps: Follow these simple steps to activate your eSIM and get connected instantly.

step1.title: Purchase Your Plan
step1.description: Choose your destination and data plan. Complete your purchase and receive QR code instantly.

step2.title: Access Device Settings
step2.description:
iOS: Go to Settings → Cellular → Add Cellular Plan
Android: Go to Settings → Network & Internet → Mobile Network → Add Carrier

step3.title: Scan QR Code
step3.description: Use your device camera or photo library to scan the QR code. Your phone will automatically detect and process the eSIM profile.

step4.title: You're Connected!
step4.description: Your eSIM is now active and ready to use. Switch between your plans in your device settings anytime.

footer.companyDescription: RoamJet - Your trusted partner for global eSIM solutions. Instant activation, worldwide coverage, and secure connectivity for travelers and businesses.

search.destinationPlaceholder: Search your destination (e.g., France, Germany, United States)
search.typeToSearch: Type at least 2 characters to search

plans.title: eSIM Plans
plans.subtitle: Choose Your Perfect eSIM Plan

jobs.title: Join Our Team
jobs.subtitle: We're looking for talented individuals to join our growing team. Explore our open positions and find the perfect role for you.

sdr.title: Sales Development Representative
sdr.description: We are looking for a motivated Sales Development Representative to join our team and help us expand our global reach. Earn 17% commission on every transaction based on your skills. Be your own boss with a 1-year contract.

nextSteps: We'll review your application within 2-3 business days
If selected, we'll contact you to schedule an interview
The interview process typically takes 1-2 weeks
We'll notify you of our decision via email
